jobDescription: Job Description : Data Analyst (SQL-SSIS,SSAS, Azure Data Lake)  Detail of Requirement  Summary Data Analyst  Role Data Analyst  Mandatory Technical Skills Ability understand complex business problems  Provide insights by fulfilling data and analysis requests  Stakeholder management  Desirable Technical Skills Proficient in writing advanced SQL Server Queries  Intermediate to advanced MS Excel  Mandatory Functional Skills Ability to understand business requirements and turn that into technical requirements  Competency in database and development programming frameworks (e.g. SQL Server/SSIS/SSAS, Azure Data Lake, or similar)  Intermediate to advanced experience with unstructured datasets (Cosmos and/or Hadoop)  Hands-on experience with Microsoft BI toolsets, in particular building Power BI visualizations and supporting data models  Proficiency in advanced Excel functions (e.g., pivot tables, Power Pivot, advanced formulas)  Desirable Functional Skills Independent, self-starter with strong program management, self-management and communication skills  Knowledge of gaming industry HUGE plus  Passion to drive improvement in the overall customer experience  Customer focused / user empathy skills  Experience working across multiple groups and teams  Be self-critical and have an accountable work approach  Total Experience Required 6-10 years
